attributes.action: prevent the execution of a pregnant British woman in Thailand
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: a youg British woman, samantha orabator, who is currently pregnant and is due to give birth in september, faces imminent execution by firing squad for alleged possession of herion. samantha is being held in inhumane conditions in laos, thailand. she has no lawyer to defend her and maintains her innocence. we call on the british government to urgently make sure that this young lady (a)no longer faces a threat of execution and (b)is given proper legal defence. foreign office officials have said they will "talk to the thai authorities next thursday", however the director of repreive, clive stafford-smith, says thursday will be too late as the authorities in laos will already have tried her by then. please do all you can because clearly there are two lives at stake here.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
